TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDataDocument extends System.Xml.XmlDocument

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("XmlDataDocument class will be removed in a future release.")

summary.span: 允许通过相关的 存储、检索和操作结构化数据。

span.span: Allows structured data to be stored, retrieved, and manipulated through a relational .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类扩展。This class extends . 这样可以加载关系数据或 XML 数据和操作使用 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 文档对象模型 (DOM) 该数据。It enables you to load either relational data or XML data and manipulate that data using the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Document Object Model (DOM). DOM 显示数据，并且节点对象的层次结构。The DOM presents data as a hierarchy of node objects. 因为`XmlDataDocument`实现接口，还可作为的源文档类。Because `XmlDataDocument` implements the interface, it can also be used as the source document for the class. `XmlDataDocument` 已关闭的附属关系具有`DataSet`类，该类提供加载的 XML 数据的关系视图。`XmlDataDocument` has a close affiliation with the `DataSet` class, which provides a relational view of the loaded XML data. 对所做任何更改`XmlDataDocument`反映在`DataSet`，反之亦然。Any changes made to the `XmlDataDocument` are reflected in the `DataSet` and vice versa. 若要加载`DataSet`用于 XML 数据，使用生成关系映射。To load a `DataSet` with XML data, use to build a relational mapping. 然后可以使用加载的 XML 数据或。The XML data can then be loaded using or . 若要加载关系数据，指定`DataSet`作为中的参数中包含的关系数据构造函数。To load relational data, specify the `DataSet` containing the relational data as the parameter in the constructor.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个空进行创建并与关联`XmlDataDocument`。An empty is created and associated with the `XmlDataDocument`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Data.DataSet dataset) cil managed

span.span: The to load into .

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlDataDocument`同步具有指定`DataSet`。The `XmlDataDocument` is synchronized with the specified `DataSet`. 中的任何数据`DataSet`立即可通过`XmlDataDocument`。Any data in the `DataSet` is immediately available through the `XmlDataDocument`. 中的任何更改`DataSet`在中传播`XmlDataDocument`。Any changes in the `DataSet` are propagated in the `XmlDataDocument`. 在中进行任何更改`XmlDataDocument`、 提供它们匹配`DataSet`架构，在中传播`DataSet`。Any changes made in the `XmlDataDocument`, provided they match the `DataSet` schema, are propagated in the `DataSet`. ## Examples 下面的示例加载到 customer 表`XmlDataDocument`。The following example loads a customer table into an `XmlDataDocument`. 该示例使用 SQL Server 2000 Northwind 数据库。The example uses the SQL Server 2000 Northwind database. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Xml.XmlNode CloneNode(bool deep) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CloneNode (deep As Boolean) As XmlNode

param.name: deep
param.span: 若要递归地克隆指定节点下的子树，则为 ；若仅克隆节点本身，则为 。

span.span: to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; to clone only the node itself.

summary.span: 创建当前节点的副本。

span.span: Creates a duplicate of the current node.
The cloned node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 克隆`XmlDataDocument`还克隆架构。Cloning the `XmlDataDocument` also clones the schema. 如果`deep`设置为`false`，克隆`DataSet`有任何数据; 即，任何行。If `deep` is set to `false`, the cloned `DataSet` has no data; that is, no rows. 如果`deep`设置为`true`，克隆`DataSet`是使用架构来设置，然后填充的数据。If `deep` is set to `true`, the cloned `DataSet` is set with the schema and then populated with the data. 请参阅中`XmlNode`类，以查看描述此方法与每个不同节点类型的行为方式的表。See in the `XmlNode` class to see a table describing how this method behaves with each of the different node types. ## Examples 下面的示例加载`DataSet`到`XmlDataDocument`，然后创建的浅表克隆的`XmlDataDocument`。The following example loads a `DataSet` into an `XmlDataDocument` and then creates a shallow clone of the `XmlDataDocument`. 该示例使用 SQL Server 2000 Northwind 数据库。The example uses the SQL Server 2000 Northwind database. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XPathNavigator`提供对数据的只读的、 随机访问。The `XPathNavigator` provides read-only, random access to data. 它非常适合 XSLT 转换，因为它提供作为输入机制来使用时的性能优势方法。Because it is optimized for XSLT transformations, it provides performance benefits when used as an input mechanism to the method. ## Examples 若要查看 XSLT 转换使用`XmlDataDocument`和`XPathNavigator`，请参阅方法。To see an XSLT transformation using `XmlDataDocument` and an `XPathNavigator`, see the method.

span.span: Gets a that provides a relational representation of the data in the .

value.span: ，该数据集可用于访问使用关系模型的 中的数据。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DataSet` ，你可以访问中的数据`XmlDataDocument`使用关系模型。The `DataSet` enables you to access the data in the `XmlDataDocument` using a relational model. 这意味着你可以处理数据作为表和视图、 行和列、 关系，依次类推。This means that you can handle the data as tables and views, rows and columns, relations, and so on. 中所做更改`DataSet`中立即可见`XmlDataDocument`。Changes made in the `DataSet` are immediately visible in the `XmlDataDocument`. ## Examples 下面的示例修改簿使用的价格`DataSet`方法。The following example modifies the price of a book using the `DataSet` methods. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例使用下面的两个文件The example uses the following two files as input. `2books.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/XML/source.xml#2)] `store.xsd` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/XML/source.xml#3)]

[!code-cpp[XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement/CPP/getrow.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement/CS/getrow.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement/VB/getrow.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下输入的文件：The example uses the following input files: `2books.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/XML/source.xml#2)] `store.xsd` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/XML/source.xml#3)]

summary.span: 使用指定的数据源加载 ，然后用加载的数据同步 。

span.span: Loads the using the specified data source and synchronizes the with the loaded data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 若要以查看 XML 数据，必须首先指定要用于数据映射的架构。In order to view the XML data relationally, you must first specify a schema to use for data mapping. 这可以通过调用方法或通过创建的表和列中的`DataSet`手动。This can be done either by calling the method or by creating the tables and columns within the `DataSet` manually. 必须在调用前完成此步骤`Load`。This step must be done before calling `Load`. `XmlDataDocument` 不支持创建实体引用。`XmlDataDocument` does not support creating entity references. 如果数据包含实体引用`Load`方法解析并展开任何实体引用。If the data includes entity references, the `Load` method resolves and expands any entity references. 但是，如果你使用`Load`采用重载作为自变量，你必须指定`XmlReader`可以解析实体。However, if you are using the `Load` overload that takes a as an argument, you must specify an `XmlReader` that can resolve entities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlDataDocument` 不支持创建实体引用。`XmlDataDocument` does not support creating entity references. 如果数据包含实体引用`Load`方法解析并展开任何实体引用。If the data includes entity references, the `Load` method resolves and expands any entity references. > [!NOTE] > 若要以查看 XML 数据，必须首先指定要用于数据映射的架构。In order to view the XML data relationally, you must first specify a schema to use for data mapping. 这可以通过调用方法或通过创建的表和列中的`DataSet`手动。This can be done either by calling the method or by creating the tables and columns within the `DataSet` manually. 必须在调用前完成此步骤`Load`。This step must be done before calling `Load`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlDataDocument` 不支持创建实体引用。`XmlDataDocument` does not support creating entity references. 如果数据包含实体引用`Load`方法解析并展开任何实体引用。If the data includes entity references, the `Load` method resolves and expands any entity references. > [!NOTE] > 若要以查看 XML 数据，必须首先指定要用于数据映射的架构。In order to view the XML data relationally, you must first specify a schema to use for data mapping. 这可以通过调用方法或通过创建的表和列中的`DataSet`手动。This can be done either by calling the method or by creating the tables and columns within the `DataSet` manually. 必须在调用前完成此步骤`Load`。This step must be done before calling `Load`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Load(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Load (reader As XmlReader)

param.name: reader
param.span: 包含要加载的 XML 文档的 。

span.span: The containing the XML document to load.

summary.span: 从指定的 加载 。

span.span: Loads the from the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlDataDocument` 不支持创建实体引用。`XmlDataDocument` does not support creating entity references. 如果数据源包含实体引用，则必须创建与属性设置为 EntityHandling.ExpandEntities （这是默认行为），并将传递`XmlValidatingReader`到`Load`方法。If the data source contains entity references, you must create an with the property set to EntityHandling.ExpandEntities (this is the default behavior) and pass the `XmlValidatingReader` to the `Load` method. 如果不使用`XmlValidatingReader`、`Load`方法引发异常。If you do not use an `XmlValidatingReader`, the `Load` method throws an exception. `Load`方法总是保留有效空白。The `Load` method always preserves significant white space. 属性确定是否保留空白。The property determines whether or not white space is preserved. 默认值是`false`，不保留空白。The default is `false`, white space is not preserved. 如果读取器处于初始状态 (即，ReadState=ReadState.Initial)`Load`使用读取器的全部内容，并生成从它找到 DOM。If the reader is in the initial state (that is, ReadState=ReadState.Initial), `Load` consumes the entire contents of the reader and builds the DOM from what it finds. 如果读取器已位于深度"n"在某个节点上，此方法将加载，该节点和所有后续同级直到关闭"n"深度的结束标记。If the reader is already positioned on some node at depth "n", then this method loads that node and all subsequent siblings up to the end tag that closes depth "n". 这会产生下列结果。This has the following results. 如果当前节点及其同级以下看起来类似于以下各项：If the current node and its following siblings look similar to the following: ```xml onetwo ``` `Load` 引发异常，因为文档不能有两个根级元素。`Load` throws an exception, because a document cannot have two root-level elements. 如果当前节点及其同级以下看起来类似于以下各项：If the current node and its following siblings look similar to the following: ```xml ``` `Load` 将会成功;但是，你将具有不完整的 DOM 树中，因为没有根级别的元素。`Load` will succeed; however, you will have an incomplete DOM tree, because there is no root-level element. 你必须首先保存文档; 添加根级元素否则为方法引发异常。You have to add a root-level element before you save the document; otherwise, the method throws an exception. 如果读取器定位于对于文档的根级别来说无效的叶节点（如空白或属性节点），则读取器继续读取，直到定位在可用于根的节点上。If the reader is positioned on a leaf node that is invalid for the root level of a document (for example, a white space or attribute node), the reader continues to read until it is positioned on a node that can be used for the root. 文档在此时开始加载。The document begins loading at this point. ## Examples 下面的示例修改簿使用的价格`DataSet`方法。The following example modifies the price of a book using the `DataSet` methods. [!code-cpp[XmlDataDocument.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.Load/CPP/loadrdr.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlDataDocument.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.Load/CS/loadrdr.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlDataDocument.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.Load/VB/loadrdr.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下两个输入的文件。The example uses the following two input files. `2books.xml` [!code-xml[XmlDataDocument.Load#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.Load/XML/2books.xml#2)] `store.xsd` [!code-xml[XmlDataDocument.Load#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.Load/XML/test.xsd#3)]

exception.span: 正在加载的 XML 包含实体引用，而该读取器不能解析实体。

span.span: The XML being loaded contains entity references, and the reader cannot resolve entities.
